content.value: This mobile application connects pet lovers with local animal shelters and rescue organizations!
They have no centralized platform for animal shelters and rescue organizations to upload their pets, and for users to search for the pet types they are looking for.

The application provides a user-friendly platform that allows shelters and rescue organizations to upload their pets and create a "personal page" for each pet. Users can select their preferences in pet type, breed, sex, activity level, and location area, etc. and easily search for the perfect pet to adopt using this application.
